meaningMnemonic: You use <radical>thread</radical> and <radical>writing</radical> to sew our <kanji>family crest</kanji>. You've been sewing your family crest since you were a kid, you could do it today with your eyes closed.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>family crest</kanji> is of a <reading>mon</reading>ster! (もん) And the writing says "Our Family Monster."
